original_text: The princes of the people are gathered together, even the people of the God of Abraham: for the shields of the earth belong unto God: he is greatly exalted.
korean_text: 뭇 나라의 고관들이 모임이여 아브라함의 하나님의 백성이 되도다 세상의 모든 방패는 하나님의 것임이여 그는 높임을 받으시리로다

sentences.original_text: The princes of the people are gathered together
even the people of the God of Abraham
for the shields of the earth belong unto God
